creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text:
Order, Allow, Deny and Satisfy have been deprecated by the new authz refactoring. Some documents still uses them. 

I've found these

mod/core
mod/mod_alias
mod/mod_authn_core
mod/mod_authn_anon
mod/mod_authz_core
mod/mod_authz_owner
mod/mod_dav
mod/mod_info
mod/mod_ldap
mod/mod_proxy
mod/mod_proxy_balancer
mod/mod_ssl
mod/mod_status
ssl/ssl_howto
misc/security_tips
env
sections

I tried to provide a patch, but I don't have enough knowledge about new authn/z.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: I've done this in most of these files, but there are some cases where I need to do a little more experimentation to figure out what is intended in the examples.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: I'm pretty sure I got all of these. Let me know if you find any that I missed.
